languages.text: "Иеронимус Скорбный... Династия Чорда прощает тебе твои прегрешения. Ты был орудием Императора, покаравшим наш дом за грехи. Потому ступай... И пусть судьей твоим будет твоя совесть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Тяжело вздохнув, Инцендия поднимает мрачный взгляд на своего исповедника. Конвульсия бьет левую половину ее лица.{/n} "Иеронимус Скорбный, династия Чорда прощает тебе твои прегрешения. Ты был орудием Императора, покаравшим наш дом за грехи. Потому ступай... И пусть судьей твоим будет твоя совесть".
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."
languages.original_text: "Иеронимус Скорбный... Династия Чорда прощает тебе твои прегрешения. Ты был орудием Императора, покаравшим наш дом за грехи. Потому ступай... И пусть судьей твоим будет твоя совесть".

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your transgressions. You were a tool of the Emperor that punished our House for its sins. Therefore go... and let your own conscience be your judge."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your transgressions. You were a tool of the Emperor that punished our House for its sins. Therefore go... and let your own conscience be your judge."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your transgressions. You were a tool of the Emperor that punished our House for its transgressions. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your transgressions. You were a tool of the Emperor that punished our House for its transgressions. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索……库尔达家族愿意原谅你的罪行。你是帝皇的工具，帝皇派你来惩罚我们的家族。既然如此，你可以走了……让你的良心来审判你吧。”
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."

traits.locale_text: “希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索……库尔达家族愿意原谅你的罪行。你是帝皇的工具，帝皇派你来惩罚我们家族的罪恶。既然如此，你走吧……让你的良心来审判你吧。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ…チョーダ家はお前の罪を許す。お前は我々の一家を罰する為に使われた、皇帝の道具だった。従って、解放しよう…良心の裁きを受けるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ…チョーダ家はお前の罪を許す。お前は我々の一家を罰する為に使われた、皇帝の道具だった。従って、解放しよう…良心の裁きを受けるのだ」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Hieronymus Doloroso... La casa Chorda le perdona por sus delitos. Fue una herramienta del Emperador para castigar a nuestra casa. Por lo tanto, puede irse... y dejar que su conciencia le juzgue».
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."

traits.locale_text: «Hieronymus Doloroso... La casa Chorda le perdona por sus transgresiones. Fue una herramienta del Emperador que castigó a nuestra casa por sus pecados. Por lo tanto, puede irse... y dejar que su conciencia sea su propio juez».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hieronymus Doloroso ... Das Haus Chorda verzeiht Euch Eure Verbrechen. Ihr wart ein Werkzeug des Imperators, das unser Haus bestrafen sollte. Geht also ... und lasst Euer Gewissen über Euch richten."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso ... Das Haus Chorda verzeiht Euch Eure Sünden. Ihr wart ein Werkzeug des Imperators, das unser Haus für seine Sünden bestraft hat. Geht also ... und lasst Euer Gewissen über Euch richten."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Hiéronymus Doloroso... La maison Chorda vous pardonne. Vous avez été le bras armé de l'Empereur châtiant notre maison, aussi êtes-vous libre... Que votre conscience soit votre juge. »
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."

traits.locale_text: « Hiéronymus Doloroso... La maison Chorda vous pardonne. Vous avez été le bras armé de l'Empereur châtiant notre maison pour les crimes qu'elle avait commis, aussi êtes-vous libre... Que votre conscience soit votre juge. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hieronymus Doloroso. Chorda Hanesi, suçlarını affediyor. Sen hanemizi cezalandırmak için İmparator tarafından gönderildin. Yani gidebilirsin. Nihai hükmü vicdanın versin."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso... House Chorda forgives you for your crimes. You were a tool of the Emperor that was meant to punish our house. Therefore, go... and let your conscience be your judge."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus Doloroso. Chorda Hanesi suçlarını affediyor. Sen hanemizi cezalandırmak için İmparator tarafından gönderildin. Yani gidebilirsin. Nihai hükmü vicdanın versin."
traits.speaker: Chorda
